snippet: Kodo, the preeminent taiko drumming ensemble from Japan, is currently playing at the Brooklyn Academy of Music. This 360° video puts you in the middle of their booming drum circle....

headline.main: Stone Wins Sunshine Tour Order of Merit
headline.print_headline: Stone Wins Sunshine Tour Order of Merit

lead_paragraph: Kodo, the preeminent taiko drumming ensemble from Japan, is currently playing at the Brooklyn Academy of Music. This 360° video puts you in the middle of their booming drum circle.
